txt.en: 'Our ships will always have need for sap to patch the hull, and the fires here burn at all hours, so there is always a need for wood.\n\n'If you can help with this, I will see that you are rewarded.'
Tankho asks that you again assist him with the task of collecting sap from the huorns, and timber from the woods to the north of Rakhatâb.
'We will put all of this to use. We do not desire to waste any of the resources that we can garner here at Rakhatâb.\n\n'Here, this is for your efforts.'
Sap for Ships and Wood for Fire (Daily)
'You will find the huorns and timber within Jâghimsa, the wooded area to the north-east of Rakhatâb. Return the sap and logs to me, and I will see you rewarded.'
Go to Jâghimsa, the woods north-east of Rakhatâb, and collect sap from the huorns and fallen logs from the trees there. Then return to Tankho at Rakhatâb.
Return the phials of sap and logs to Tankho at Rakhatâb
